subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Persistent lightning and rain forced the suspension of third-round play of the 90th P.G.A. Championship on Saturday, forcing 48 of 73 players to complete the round on Sunday morning.
snippet: Persistent lightning and rain forced the suspension of third-round play of the 90th P.G.A. Championship on Saturday, forcing 48 of 73 players to complete the round on Sunday morning.
